title: Account Creation Explanation Panel
description: Added clear explanation of why accounts are necessary during signup.
details:
New explanation panel on signup page answers 'Why do I need an account?' with three key reasons:
1. Highly individualized conversations and experience script design
2. Prevents mixed archetype results (separate accounts for brokers/agents)
3. Assigns clients to brokers for life for commission tracking

Includes backend account sync upon successful Supabase signup with graceful error handling.
author: Frontend Team

title: Experience Builder Major UX Overhaul
description: Completely redesigned the 3-step experience builder with year selection, seasonal warnings, back navigation, and visual improvements.
details:
Major improvements to the When/Where/What experience builder:

**Year Selection & Validation:**
- Added year dropdown to 'When' step (current year + next 5 years)
- Validates against past dates (prevents booking in the past)
- Clear date validation error messages

**Seasonal Intelligence:**
- Warnings for unsuitable destination/season combinations
- Example: 'UAE in July can be extremely hot (45Â°C+). Consider October-April for more comfortable weather.'
- Suggestions without blocking user choice

**Navigation Improvements:**
- Back buttons on all selection sub-pages
- Persistent main page shows all selections
- Easy navigation between When/Where/What choices
- 'Suggest best option' buttons for AI recommendations

**Visual Enhancements:**
- Replaced emojis with high-quality Unsplash images
- Improved destination cards with hover effects
- Added more destinations (Adriatic Coast, Cyclades, Balearics)
- Consistent card design across all steps

**Approval Screen:**
- Updated copy to set clear expectations for next step
- Fixed redirect path to /experience/chat
author: Frontend Team

title: Frontend-Backend API Integration
description: Created unified API client for frontend to communicate with AIfred backend.
details:
New API client library (lib/api/lexa-client.ts) provides:

**Core Methods:**
- createAccount: Syncs Supabase signup with backend
- converse: Real-time conversation with LEXA
- composeScript: Generates experience scripts
- getRecommendations: POI recommendations based on preferences
- downloadPdf: Experience script PDF export

**Features:**
- Automatic session management (stores account_id and session_id in localStorage)
- Comprehensive error handling
- Graceful offline fallbacks
- User-friendly error messages
- Environment-based API URL configuration (NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL)

**Documentation:**
- Created FRONTEND_BACKEND_INTEGRATION.md with API endpoints, data flow, and debugging tips
- Created TESTING_CHECKLIST.md with step-by-step test scenarios
author: Full Stack Team

title: Automated GitHub + Vercel Deployment Pipeline
description: Confirmed and utilized existing automated deployment pipeline for rapid Captain presentation deployment.
details:
Leveraged existing deployment automation:

**Deployment Flow:**
1. Code changes committed to git
2. Pushed to GitHub main branch
3. GitHub webhook triggers Vercel
4. Vercel builds and deploys automatically
5. Live in 2-5 minutes

**Benefits:**
- No manual Vercel CLI needed
- Consistent deployment process
- Automatic build verification
- Instant rollback capability
- Full deployment history in Vercel dashboard

**This Sprint:**
- 16 files changed, 3,554 insertions
- All changes deployed for Captain presentation
- Zero deployment errors
author: DevOps
